column1: * 1920 - Voice actor William Conrad is born.
* 1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Aurelius Pompen.
* 2004 - Parma Eldalamberon issue Parma Eldalamberon 15 is published.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard is released.
** Frodo Baggins and his companions spend the second night with Tom Bombadil because of the rain. While discussing with him about the One Ring
column2: Frodo wears it for first time.
